title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Thank you for using CrossSend. This application highly values user privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.

sections.title: No Personal Information Collection
sections.content: CrossSend does not collect your name, email, phone number, or any other information that can identify you.

sections.title: No Internet Connection
sections.content: All file transfers are completed between devices through local networks, without going through servers, and no data is uploaded to the cloud.

sections.title: Local Data Storage
sections.content: Records, history, and cache generated within the application are only saved locally on your device. We neither access nor upload this data.

sections.title: No Third-Party Tracking
sections.content: The application does not integrate any advertising SDKs or third-party data tracking services.

sections.title: Permissions Usage
sections.content: The app requires the following permissions: Local device discovery permission to find and connect to other devices on the same Wi-Fi network; Wireless network permission for file transfers; File read/write permission for file transfer operations that you actively choose.

sections.title: User Data Management
sections.content: You can delete all locally stored transfer history records and cached files through the "Clear Data" option in the application settings. Uninstalling the application will also completely remove all local data.

sections.title: Privacy Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. When there are significant changes, we will display a notification within the application and update the date on this page. We recommend that you periodically review this policy to understand any changes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via email at support@crosssend.app. We will do our utmost to assist you.
